properties.label: Sign Up
properties.messageShowAfterComplete: Your account has been created. You can now proceed to login.

properties.label: Sign Document Success
properties.content:
Thank you for signing.

  • A copy of the signed document will be emailed to you after all parties have successfully signed.
  • If you did not get a copy within 3 days, please send us an email and let us know via info+signdoc@joget.org and we will get it sorted out.

Have a great day!!

=) Joget Team

properties.label: Apply
properties.messageShowAfterComplete: Your contract has been created. You can now proceed with eSigning

properties.list-customHeader:
<style>
    .statusBox {
        padding: 3px !important;
        border-radius: 4px !important;
        white-space: nowrap !important;
        color: white !important;
        width: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .dataList .rowActionsDropdown .dropdown-menu .row_action a{
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.25rem 1.5rem;
        clear: both;
        font-weight: 400;
        color: #212529 !important;
        text-align: inherit;
        white-space: nowrap;
        background-color: transparent !important;
        border-color: transparent !important;
        border: 0;
        box-shadow: none !important;
        width: auto;
        
    }
</style>
properties.edit-customHeader:
<style>
span#signatories_annotation_data{
    visibility: hidden;
}

span#signatories_annotation_data > a{
    visibility: visible;
}

</style>

properties.label: All Applications
User Manual
properties.content:
📣 User Manual - Setup

Please ensure that the following requirements are met:

✅ The user who added the document must have a valid email set in their profile. 
✅ SMTP must be configured in Settings > SMTP Settings.
✅ Now, you can start using the Signing Doc app.

properties.label: Assign Signatories
properties.messageShowAfterComplete: PDF File is ready to sign. Please choose the Action to continue.

properties.customHeader:
<style>
    body .dataList td.row_action {
        display: inline-block;
        float: left;
        padding: 0 !important;
    }
     
    th.row_action.footable-visible {
        display: inline;
    }
 
    .row_action_inner a {
        padding: 10px;
        float: left;
    }
</style>
